settings.enable-blur-hint: ⚠️ Activating this setting may cause a drop in performance.
settings.chat-opacity-value-hint: This setting controls the opacity value of the chat cards. Set this setting to "1" to disable this feature.
settings.chat-opacity-timer-hint: This setting controls how long before a newly created chat card becomes transparent (in seconds).
settings.window-content-opacity-value-hint: This setting controls the opacity value of all windows except those linked to the sidebar. Set this setting to "1" to disable this feature.
settings.collapse-hotbar-hint: Collapses the hotbar on startup. You may find this setting usefull if your party do not use macros.
settings.no-pause-hint: Removes the pause on startup. Only if a GM logs in.
settings.reduce-scene-list-hint: Reduces the height of scenes in the sidebar.

hide-interface-form.title: List of interface components
hide-interface-form.how-to: Uncheck the components you wish to hide from the players and/or the GM.

color-theme-form.title: Color theme
color-theme-form.how-to: Change the colors of the various components by supplying valid hexadecimal codes.

theme-glass.blurWarningMessage: ⚠️ This module makes extensive use of blur effects. If you experience a drop in performance, you can click on the button below to disable the setting: "Blur effects".
